price: 除安拉外，你们不要崇拜任何物。我的确怕你们遭受痛苦日的惩罚。”
arabic: أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: an lā taʿbudū illā al-laha innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin alīmin
